config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The _transientMode configuration determines whether to use a TransientJournal or a PersistentJournal in the journal() method. If _transientMode is true, a TransientJournal is created. If false, a PersistentJournal is created with specific parameters.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _transientMode configuration depends on how often the journal() method is called in the system. If the method is called frequently, the configuration will be triggered more often.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _transientMode configuration option on the system is significant as it determines the type of journal used. Using a TransientJournal may result in faster performance but data loss upon system shutdown, while using a PersistentJournal ensures data persistence but may impact performance.
